_description: Mapping from portfolio asset names to ticker symbols for Alpha Vantage API
_instructions: Add mappings for your portfolio assets. Use the exact name as it appears in your Google Sheets portfolio.
_notes: For European stocks, use the appropriate exchange suffix (e.g., .L for London, .PA for Paris)
For US stocks, use the standard ticker symbol without suffix
The app will throw an error for any unmapped stock names and ask you to update this file
Stock names must match exactly as they appear in your portfolio sheets
